channel.title: Item.cfg help
channel.description:
i added a couple items to my item.cfg and its also in my item.java but when i run my server i get this error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "4 5" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:314) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code]
help?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2007, 11:51:10 AM[/size][hr]this forum is starting to suck since silab came out with her client, no1 even helps anymore :mad:

item.title: Item.cfg help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

xx nub xx:

you used spaces between the numbers instead of tabs

oh, is that y, i nvr knew, thx

Read full topic
